item.title: LL_010_polybar_setup
item.description: www.youtube.com/watch?v=7RNgpvBMua0 Get more screen estate by setting up polybar, the budRich way (having it overlaying the topmost titlebar).

item.title: LL_011_polybar_hook_modules
item.description: www.youtube.com/watch?v=NZeqsLWcm6o This is part 1 of 2 in a tutorial on how polyabars “ipc/hook”- modules work. The goal of the tutorial is to create a module in polybar that displays the title of the active window, but if one clicks (or send a message via a keybinding or terminal) the title it will instead display the class and instance of the title. I will also show how we by right clicking, title/class/instance will get the clicked information in our clipboard.

item.title: LL_012_polybar_dynamic_title
item.description: www.youtube.com/watch?v=3vQtovcQElY This is part 2 of 2 in a tutorial on how polyabars “ipc/hook”- modules work. The goal of the tutorial is to create a module in polybar that displays the title of the active window, but if one clicks (or send a message via a keybinding or terminal) the title it will instead display the class and instance of the title. I will also show how we by right clicking, title/class/instance will get the clicked information in our clipboard.

item.title: LL_013_colors_are_poison
item.description: This is part 1 of 3 (or more videos) about how to set up colors and fonts using .Xresources and synching the settings in multiple applications. In this first video I will show the basics of setting up .Xresources and how it works. The files used in this video can be found on github. Gruvbox color theme by morhertz (Pavel Pertsev) https://github.com/morhetz/gruvbox Solarized color theme by Ethan Schoonover http://ethanschoonover.com/solarized

item.title: LL_014_rice_of_poison
item.description: www.youtube.com/watch?v=m2XUxyTmOkQ This is part 2 of 3 (or more videos) about how to set up colors and fonts using .Xresources and synching the settings in multiple applications. In this video I apply the settings to i3wm. The files used in this video can be found on github. Gruvbox color theme by morhertz (Pavel Pertsev) https://github.com/morhetz/gruvbox Solarized color theme by Ethan Schoonover http://ethanschoonover.com/solarized

item.title: LL_015_polypoison
item.description: www.youtube.com/watch?v=OIjwl0MjfBA This is part 3 of 3 (or more) videos about how to set up colors and fonts using .Xresources and synching the settings in multiple applications. In this video I apply the settings to polybar. The files used in this video can be found on github. Gruvbox color theme by morhertz (Pavel Pertsev) https://github.com/morhetz/gruvbox Solarized color theme by Ethan Schoonover http://ethanschoonover.com/solarized

item.title: i3ass_update_18-01-07
item.description: www.youtube.com/watch?v=nz7ugomqkuI I have made several fixes and added some new functions and scripts to my i3ass project. In this video i show the new stuff and talk about the future of the let’s linux series.
